Umbrella.name: Umbrella
Umbrella.description:
Protects against Acid Rain. For every minute exposed to Acid Rain, all armor ablates by 1 SP (NCW pg 4).

+2 to Resist Torture/Drugs Checks from Blood Rain exposure. Severe Blood Rain applies the effects of a Vial of Biotoxin on failed check (NCW pg 4).

Cold-Weather Jacket Lining.name: Cold-Weather Jacket Lining
Cold-Weather Jacket Lining.description: Upgrade for any Jacket fashion item. User will not suffer Exposure penalties from cold temperatures (CP:R pg 181).

Hot-Weather Jacket Lining.name: Hot-Weather Jacket Lining
Hot-Weather Jacket Lining.description:
Upgrade for any Jacket fashion item. User will not suffer Exposure penalties from hot temperatures (CP:R pg 181). 

Heatwaves double all penalties from heavier armor (NCW pg 5).  For example, a user with Medium Armorjack takes a -4 penalty to MOVE, DEX, and REF during a Heatwave. Hot-Weather Jacket Lining decreases each of these penalties by 1.

Waterproof Jacket Lining.name: Waterproof Jacket Lining
Waterproof Jacket Lining.description:
Upgrade for any Jacket fashion item. Mechanically similar to an umbrella, does not serve as a wetsuit. 

Protects against Acid Rain. For every minute exposed to Acid Rain, all armor ablates by 1 SP (NCW pg 4).

+2 to Resist Torture/Drugs Checks from Blood Rain exposure. Severe Blood Rain applies the effects of a Vial of Biotoxin on failed check (NCW pg 4).

Tactical Umbrella.name: Tactical Umbrella
Tactical Umbrella.description:
A stylish umbrella with pop-out weapons. Contains a Poor Quality Exotic Heavy Pistol (2 bullet capacity).

Multiple Weapon Modes: Tactical Umbrella also contains an Excellent Quality Exotic Heavy Melee Weapon.

Provides the protection of a normal umbrella (NCW pg 6)
